CustomField.formula: IF(LEN( Name ) < 5, 0,20) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,"" ), 0,20) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Status ,"" ), 0,20) + IF(LEN( TEXT(MONTH( StartDate )))= 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( EndDate ))) = 0, 0,10) + IF( NumberOfContacts + NumberOfLeads = 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN( TEXT( ExpectedRevenue ) ) = 0, 0,10)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
